Class LevelViewLevelThree

java.lang.Object
com.example.demo.levels.LevelView
com.example.demo.levels.LevelViewLevelTwo
com.example.demo.levels.LevelViewLevelThree
public class LevelViewLevelThree extends LevelViewLevelTwo
Represents the visual components and user interface specific to level three. Extends LevelViewLevelTwo to add or modify functionalities for level three.

      public LevelViewLevelThree(javafx.scene.Group root, int heartsToDisplay)
